1.text: You have found the PC, if you run the function below you will receive a wrong greeting: 'hey stranger', correct the code to display your name in the greeting and you are ready to go!

2.text: Congratulations! The first riddle is done! You can now move inside of the room but still there is no light... Create a function that changes text to binary code and you will finally see what is around you.

3.text: All drawers besides the second are opening but they are empty... Create a function that can check if a word contains only unique characters, if you make this work the second drawer will open.

4.text: This is a beginning of a long and encoded message: `epqqwdwuyku_vtqttjeqqivhyvl_ugwgtmkwguu_uk_gtvkhukgved pmuqyupxpvvpuxkwptgjmdzuu_ljytuuuvtvxvuulip_qi _vlxqmg_ietpmlvxvvudipem_jldvmkglvliekdkjwkdlgjk...`. The secret word contains letters with the highest occurrence and finishes with `_`.

5.text: Battleship game. Looks like before death the skeleton was trying to solve this code challenge... better be faster than him and create a function that checks if you could shoot an opponents ship in the battleship game. If you succeed the skeleton will give you a hand...

6.text: You are almost there! The last step before I set you free is to enter the right code...

7.text: dummy description 7 SHOULD OPEN EXIT DOOR

8.text: 3 slots with colors, a screen and a box...

10.text: There is something worth checking behind this door... but where is the key?

escapeDoorClosed.text: The solid door is closed, there is also no doorknob and it does not budge...

needCode.text: There are numbers on the safe. You could test around but it will take you too long, better find another way to open it.
